ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Everything is recorded, big or small.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All things small or great have been written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: everything large or small, is duly inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every small or great deed is written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And every small and great thing is recorded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And everything, small and large, is written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And everything small and great is written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and everything, great and small, is inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And every small and great thing is recorded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: every action, small or great, is noted down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And everything, small and great, hath been written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and everything big and small is committed to writing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Every matter, small and great, is on record.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And everything, small and big is written (in Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz already beforehand i.e. before it befalls, or is done by its doer) (See the Quran V. 57:22).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: everything, be it great or small, is recorded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Everything, small or large, is written down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:53] and every small and great, sin, or deed, is inscribed, is recorded in the Preserved Tablet (al-lawh al-mahfūz).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And every small and great thing) of good or evil (is recorded) in the Guarded Tablet; this was revealed about the people who disputed about fate and who denied that everything is recorded in the Guarded Tablet.
